title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 5 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 5 2022
description:
Why #BuckSexton was trending all weekend. Biden approval reaches a record low. Clay notes: "Joe Biden came into office arguing that he was going to unite America... Nearly 90% of Americans believe the country is headed in the wrong direction." Democrats call for more gun control. Clay says, "Their goal is to end the Second Amendment." Chicago shootings. Buck notes it was more than the horrific mass shooting: 71 shot, 8 killed in 4th of July weekend violence. Highland Park shooter's social media most likely shows mental illness. C&B ask: What can be done about the mental illness that might be obvious much earlier in potential mass shooters? Illinois Governor J.B. Pritzker uses the Democrat playbook of fear and lies to advance gun control. What sparked America’s wave of violence, that Clay notes seems to have started in the '90s, and how do we stop it?

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
